name: Gridiron
description:
Gridiron is a fast-paced fusion of sci-fi and arcade-style American football. Featuring easy to understand controls and a competitive multiplayer driven online experience. Gridiron features up to 7v7 both casual and competitive online matches, offline practice mode and much more! Gridiron will never be pay-to-win and will always prioritize skill based mechanics.

Stay up to date as we will be releasing tons of new content and features throughout early access!

Including:
Replays
New Game Modes
Exhibition/Franchise
Custom Playbook
Cosmetic Items and Customization Options
New Gridiron Champions
Ranked Rewards
Tournaments
And much more!
